text: @Alyssa_Milano Alyssa u r so misinformed as usual. 66% of COVID-19 cases in New York were from people that were quarantined that stayed at home not essential workers that were out in the public. Proof that u r not safer staying at home. You look for any and every opportunity to trash Trump!
